pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenic shot of a car on a paved road winding through a majestic forest of giant trees. Sunlight filters through the dense canopy, illuminating the lush greenery and the vehicle. The car is in motion, traveling along the curve of the road.
